CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: high-explosive
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: The high-explosive charge detonates on impact, scattering lethal shell fragments in a large area.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: EMP
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Creates an electro-magnetic burst on impact, temporarily disrupting electronic systems and Mechanoids.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: Incendiary
